resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106020</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106020</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206770</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Battle of Bunker Hill: Now We Are at War</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Schlacht des Bunker-Hügels: Jetzt sind 
wir am Krieg</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La bataille de la colline de soute : 
Maintenant nous sommes à la guerre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A batalha do monte de bunker: Agora nós 
estamos na guerra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La battaglia della collina di carbonile: Ora
siamo alla guerra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μάχη του Hill αποθηκών: Τώρα είμαστε στον 
πόλεμο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La batalla de la colina de arcón: Ahora 
estamos en la guerra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">describes how this American Revolution battle spurred colonial unity and sparked the formation of the Continental Army.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">beschreibt wie diese angetriebene Kolonialeinheit 
der amerikanischen Umdrehung Schlacht und gefunkt der Anordnung der 
kontinentalen Armee.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">décrit comment cette unité coloniale stimulée 
par bataille de révolution américaine et étincelé la formation de 
l'armée continentale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">descreve como esta unidade colonial spurred 
batalha da volta americana e acendido a formação do exército 
continental.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">descrive come questa battaglia di giro americano 
ha stimolato l'unità coloniale ed ha scintillato la formazione 
dell'esercito continentale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιγράφει πώς αυτή η αμερικανική μάχη επαναστάσεων 
κέντρισε την αποικιακή ενότητα και προκάλεσε το σχηματισμό του 
ηπειρωτικού στρατού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">describe cómo esta unidad colonial estimulada 
batalla de la revolución americana y chispeado la formación del 
ejército continental.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206770</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106020</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-battle-of-bunker-hill-now-we-are-at-war</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
